scripts.test:api: cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/api/**/*.cy.js && npx mochawesome-merge mochawesome-report/*.json > mochawesome-api.json && npx marge mochawesome-api.json
scripts.test:frontend: cypress run --spec cypress/e2e/frontend/**/*.cy.js && npx mochawesome-merge mochawesome-report/*.json > mochawesome-frontend.json && npx marge mochawesome-frontend.json
scripts.test:all: cypress run && npx mochawesome-merge mochawesome-report/*.json > mochawesome.json && npx marge mochawesome.json
